analyzed: om
śrīmat prabhākara guru tantra dhurandhareṇa
mahā mahā upādhyāya śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇa pañcikā
nyāyasiddhi ākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣama sthala ṭipparāyā
ca samalaṅkṛtā
amṛtakalā nāma
pañcamam
pramāṇa lakṣaṇam
pramāṇam sā smṛteḥ anyā smṛtiḥ punar
pūrva vijñāna saṃskāra mātra jam jñānam ucyate
na pramāṇam smṛtiḥ pūrva pratipatteḥ apekṣaṇāt
anyonya nirapekṣāḥ tu dhārāvāhika buddhayaḥ
tatra pañcavidham mānam pratyakṣam anumā tathā
śāstram iti garoḥ matam
sākṣāt pratītiḥ pratyakṣam meya mātṛ pramāsu sā
meyeṣu indriya yoga utthā dravya jāti guṇeṣu sā
sa vikalpa avikalpā ca pratyakṣā buddhiḥ iṣyate
ādyā viśiṣṭa viṣayā svarūpa viṣayā itarā
sarva vijñāna hetu utthā mitau mātari ca pramā
pratyakṣa tvena sammatā
pramāṇa phala bhāva nirūpaṇam
jñānasya tu phalam sā eva vyavahāra upayoginī
āpekṣikam ca karaṇam manaḥ indriyam eva vā
tad artha sannikarṣaḥ vā mānam ced pūrvakam phalam
anumāna nirūpaṇam
jñāta sambandha niyamasya eka deśasya darśanāt
eka deśa antare buddhiḥ anumānam abādhite  /
yaḥ kaścid yena yasya iha sambandhaḥ nirupādhikaḥ
pratyakṣa ādi pramā siddhaḥ sa tasya gamakaḥ mataḥ
prameyam anumānasya dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇam
vacanam dūṣaṇaiḥ sārdham arthāt etena varṇitam
pratyakṣa vat ca pramāṇa phala varṇanā
śāstra nirūpaṇam
śāstram tu śabda vijñānāt yat asat nikṛṣṭa artha vijñānam
sādṛśya darśana uttham jñānam sādṛśya viṣayam upamānam
sya vitti siddhaḥ bhinnaḥ dravya ādi bhāvebhyaḥ
sādṛśyāt dṛśyamānāt yat pratiyogini jāyate
sādṛśya viṣayam jñānam upamānam tat ucyate
vinā kalpanayā arthena dṛṣṭena anupapanna tām
dṛṣṭam artham yā sā arthāpattiḥ tu kalpanā
abhāvena gṛhe bhāvaḥ bahiṣkalpanayā vinā
nayatā anupapanna tvam bahis yathā
gamyasya anupapanna tvam iha kalpanayā vinā

original: deśena hi vinābhāvo na kadācana dṛśyate /
analyzed: deśena hi vinābhāvaḥ na kadācana dṛśyate
vinābhāvena siddhaḥ pi tena sandeham ṛcchati
tad sandeha vyudāsāya kalpanā yā pravarttate
yad kalpanām vinā yaḥ ṛthaḥ pratītaḥ u pyeti saṃśayam
tena tad kalpanām eke tu arthāpattim pracakṣate
gamakasya anumāne tu vipakṣa asattva lakṣaṇam
gamyate nupapannatvam vinā gamyena vastunā
tad sāmagrī vibhedena bhinne ete parasparam
arthāpatti anumāna ākhye pramāṇe iti niścitam
anupalabdhi pramāṇa nirākaraṇam
pramāṇam ye ṣaṣṭham āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
teṣām prābhākaraiḥ evam pratyādeśaḥ yam ucyate
pramāṇam khalu kasya api prameyasya avabodhakam
kim tāvat prameyam iti cintyatām

original: nanu nāstīti buddhyā93 tu bodhyaṃ yadupakalpitam /
analyzed: nanu na asti iti tu bodhyam yat upakalpitam
abhāvasya pramāṇasya prameyam tat bhaviṣyati

original: bhūtela'tra ghaṭo nāstītyeṣā yā jāyate matiḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ na asti iti eṣā yā jāyate matiḥ
sā na bhū tala mātre syāt prasakteḥ ghaṭavati api
kevale bhū tale ced syāt kaivalyam tatra
svarūpa mātram no tāvat dharma antaram atha ucyate
prameya antaram evā atra tāvatā aṅgīkṛtam bhavet
tat ca na indriya vijñeyam tad vyāpāra anapekṣaṇāt
sva rūpa mātre dṛṣṭe pi bhāve dūra gataḥ pi san
kathañcid jāta jijñāsaḥ nāstitvam pratipadyate
tena yatra api nāstitvam budhyate vyāpṛta indriyaḥ
bhāva aṃśa mātre tatra api pratyakṣasya pramāṇa tā
nāstitvam ca pramāṇānām anutpattyā eva gamyate
nāstitva pratipattiḥ hi tām vinā nā asti kutracid
yogya pramāṇa anutpatteḥ kāraṇa tva parigrahāt
atiprasaṅga doṣaḥ pi na avakāśam upāśnute
anutpattiḥ ca na jñātā satī kāraṇam akṣa vat
tena liṅga tva śaṅkā api dūrāt eva nirākṛtā
anutpattiḥ ca vijñātā hetuḥ ced liṅga vat bhavet

original: anavasthā prasajyeta nāstitvaṃ na ca siddhyati // 35 //
analyzed: anavasthā prasajyeta nāstitvam na ca siddhi ati
kiñca pāda vihāra ādi vyavahāraḥ ca bhū tale
na bhū tala pariccheda mātreṇa eva pravartate  /
prasaṅgaḥ tatra durvāraḥ kaṇṭaka ādi anvite hi
atha kevala bhū bhāga paricchedāt pravartate

original: vikalpyaṃ tatra kaivalyaṃ grāhyasya grahaṇasya vā /
analyzed: vikalpyam tatra kaivalyam grāhyasya grahaṇasya vā
grāhyasya ced purā eva uktaḥ doṣaḥ tarhi prasajyate
grahasya ced tadā sūkṣma jijñāsā niṣphalām bhavet
jātāḥ hi kevalāḥ vyavahārasya kāraṇam
tena bhāvam paricchidya vyavahāre cikīrṣati
dṛśya adarśana siddhi artham yuktam
atrā ucyate dvayī saṃvid vastunaḥ bhū tala ādinaḥ
ekā saṃsṛṣṭa viṣayā tanmātra viṣayā parā

original: tanmātraviṣayā yā ca dvidhā sā'pi prasajyate /
analyzed: tanmātra viṣayā yā ca dvidhā sā api prasajyate
pratiyogini adṛśye ca dṛśye ca pratiyogini
tatra tanmātra dhīḥ yā iyam dṛśye ca pratiyogini
nāstitvam sā eva bhū bhāge ghaṭa ādi pratiyoginaḥ
nanu saṃsṛṣṭa buddhyā yaḥ purastāt avadhāritaḥ

original: kathaṃ tanmātradhīstatra jātā bhāvo96 na tatra cet // 44 //
analyzed: katham tanmātra dhīḥ tatra jātā na tatra ced

original: śakyate tadabhāve 'pi vaktuṃ yo yatra sannabhūt /
analyzed: śakyate tad abhāve vaktum yaḥ yatra san abhūt
tasya abhāvaḥ katham tatra brūyāt ced tatra kāraṇam  /
tanmātra dhiyaḥ eva astu tat kāraṇam tatas
tasyāḥ sampratipanna tvāt vādinoḥ ubhayoḥ api
cakṣuḥ vat aparāmṛṣṭam na kāraṇam adarśanam
svāpa avasthā gatasya api
viśeṣa āpādikā tasya na niṣedhasya dṛśya tā
bhāva rūpaḥ viśeṣaḥ hi na abhāvasya upapadyate
adarśane nivṛtte kasyacid
prāk nāstitvam vyapadiśanti adṛṣṭasya purā kvacid
dṛśyasya adarśanam tena jñātam
dṛśya adarśanataḥ tasya jñānam
yadi tanmātra saṃvitti rūpam syāt tat adarśanam
tadā tasyāḥ sva saṃvitteḥ anavasthā nivartate
tena avaśya abhyupetavyaḥ vimarśaḥ dṛśya gocaraḥ
adarśanam abhāvaḥ hi tanmātra anubhava ātmakam
tanmātra anubhavaḥ ca ayam yat adarśana rūpitaḥ
vimṛśyate bhū tala ādau
tanmātra anubhavaḥ ca ayam na meyaḥ phala bhāvataḥ
kiñca svayam prakāśaḥ sau iti nyāya vidaḥ viduḥ
na asti iti śabdaḥ tatra eva sva saṃvedye pravartate
tena na asti iti vijñāna nyāyena na samāgatam
meya abhāve tatas mānam abhāva ākhyam katham bhavet

original: ghaṭasattā na labhyā hi nāsattā coditātkramāt // 56 //
analyzed: ghaṭa sattā na labhyā hi na asattā coditāt kramāt
abhāva vyavahāraḥ hi niḥśaṅka gamana ādikaḥ
tanmātra anubhavena eva yathā uktena pravartate  /
yadā yasya ca dṛśya tve sati api anupalambhanam
tad abhāva vyavahṛtiḥ tadānīm saṃpravartate
sūkṣma kaṇṭaka jijñāsā api atas sārthaka tām gatā

original: tāṃ vinā na hi dṛśyatvaṃ sūkṣmasattā'dhirohati // 59 //
analyzed: tām vinā na hi dṛśya tvam sūkṣma sattā adhirohati
vyavahāra pravṛttiḥ ca dṛśya adṛṣṭi nibandhanā
tena dṛśya tva siddhi artham tasmin nirīkṣaṇam
nanu evam lakṣaṇa granthasya arthaḥ tarhi asya kīdṛśaḥ
mīmāṃsā arṇava sambhūtam pīyatām
pratyakṣa ādi aparicchedyam abhāva ākhyam
prameyam sādhayat mānam abhāva ākhyam vadanti ye
tad nirākaraṇa arthaḥ yam yatnaḥ bhāṣyakṛtā kṛtaḥ
saṃnikṛṣṭasya na asti iti asya avabodhakaḥ
pramāṇam na bhavati iti pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate
kim nirākaraṇasya iha phalam iti atha ced matam
ucyate lakṣaṇa granthaḥ pratyakṣa ādeḥ samarthyate
pramāṇam kārya gamyam hi sarvatra iti viniścitam
niścayaḥ ca pramāṇasya kāryam iti api saṃmatam
niścayaḥ ca iyam eva iti saṃvittiḥ sarva vastuṣu
sā ca vastu antara abhāva saṃvitti anugame sati
pramāṇa anudayaḥ tatra yatra abhāvaḥ vasīyate

original: tadā tena sahaiva syāt pratyakṣādeḥ pramāṇatā /
analyzed: tadā tena saha eva syāt pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇa tā
lakṣaṇam kriyamāṇam ca tathābhūtasya yujyate

original: na kṛtaṃ ca tathā tena na kṛtaṃ sādhulakṣaṇam /
analyzed: na kṛtam ca tathā tena na kṛtam sādhu lakṣaṇam
imām śaṅkām nirākartu nirākaraṇam ucyate  /
katham punar iyam śaṅkā bhavati atra nirākṛtā

original: abhāvākhyo na meyo 'sti yadarthaṃ prārtyate punaḥ // 70 //
analyzed: abhāva ākhyaḥ na meyaḥ sti yad artham prārtyate punar
pramāṇānām anutpādaḥ sādhu tat lakṣaṇam kṛtam
iti pūrvapramāṇānām lakṣaṇāni samādadhat
bhāṣyakāraḥ imam grantham cakre na abhāva lakṣaṇam

original: nanvevamapi 105 pañcāha śabdaṃ hitvā kathaṃ punaḥ // 72 //
analyzed: nanu evam api pañca āha śabdam hitvā katham punar
bhāṣyakāraḥ pramāṇāni citra ākṣepam samādadhat
ucyate vyavahārasya hetu bhūta prasiddhaye
evam āha ubhaya ātmā api vyavahāraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
tatra bhāva vyavahṛtiḥ pañcasu eva upalabhyate
abhāva vyavahāraḥ tu dṛśya adṛṣṭi vimarśa jaḥ
sā hi bhū bhāga sadbhāva mātra avaccheda bandhanā
tad abhāva vyavahṛtiḥ iti prāk eva darśitam
mīmāṃsā jala rāśeḥ aśeṣa naya ratna nikaṣa nija dhāmnaḥ
iti śālikanāthaḥ imām amṛtasya

original: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāmamṛtakalā nāma pañcamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti mahā mahā upādhyāya śrī śālikanāthamiśra praṇītāyām prakaraṇa pañcikāyām amṛtakalā nāma pañcamam prakaraṇam samāptam
